description: Standard delivery and engagement metric names for forecasts. For outcome/conversion forecasts (purchases, leads, app installs, etc.), use event-type enum values as metric keys instead. The ForecastPoint metrics map accepts any string key, so both forecastable-metric and event-type values can be used together.

enumDescriptions.grps: Estimated Gross Rating Points (for CPP). When present, the demographic_system and demographic fields on DeliveryForecast should specify the target demographic.
enumDescriptions.reach: Estimated unique reach. The reach_unit field on DeliveryForecast specifies the measurement unit (individuals, households, devices, etc.).
enumDescriptions.spend: Estimated spend in the forecast currency

title: Forecastable Metric
